settings.journal.title: Create Matching Journals
settings.journal.hint: Enabling this will create matching journal entries
settings.journalunsup.title: Create Matching Journals for unsupported (non-webm) files
settings.journalunsup.hint: Enabling this will create matching journal entries for jpg files in a picture journal
settings.journalfolder.title: Specificy Journal Folder
settings.journalfolder.hint: Enter which journal folder these journal entries should end up in
settings.journalp.title: Journal Default Permissions
settings.journalp.hint: Changing this will set the default permissions for the journal entries
settings.visibiltydv.title: Player access
settings.visibiltydv.hint: Enabling this will make it so your players will receive the video popups. Disable for GM Only
conditionsmanager.title: Conditions Manager
conditionsmanager.hint: Specify which string condition should be true in the file-name matches
conditionsmanager.label: Configure
conditionsmanager.description: Conditions by Name - file name must match at least 1 of these conditions (Ex: '_BM')
exclusionsmanager.title: Exclusions Manager
exclusionsmanager.hint: Add which scenes should not dynamically generate video elements
exclusionsmanager.label: Configure
exclusionsmanager.description: Exclusions by any part of a file name (Ex: 'Barovia_Map')
